org.geysermc.connector.network.translators.sound

Annotation Type SoundHandler


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface SoundHandler
    Marks if a class should be handled as a SoundInteractionHandler.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String[] blocks
      The identifier(s) that the placed block must contain one of.
      String[] entities
      The identifier(s) that the interacted entity must have.
      boolean ignoreSneakingWhileHolding
      Controls if the interaction should still be called even if the player is sneaking while holding something in their hand.
      String[] items
      The identifier(s) that the player's hand item must contain one of.

    • Element Detail

      • blocks

        public abstract String[] blocks
        The identifier(s) that the placed block must contain one of. Leave empty to ignore. Only applies to interaction handlers that are an instance of BlockSoundInteractionHandler.
        Returns:
        the value the interacted block must contain
        Default:
        {}

      • items

        public abstract String[] items
        The identifier(s) that the player's hand item must contain one of. Leave empty to ignore.
        Returns:
        the value the item in the player's hand must contain
        Default:
        {}

      • entities

        public abstract String[] entities
        The identifier(s) that the interacted entity must have. Leave empty to ignore. Only applies to interaction handlers that are an instance of BlockSoundInteractionHandler.
        Returns:
        the value the item in the player's hand must contain
        Default:
        {}

      • ignoreSneakingWhileHolding

        public abstract boolean ignoreSneakingWhileHolding
        Controls if the interaction should still be called even if the player is sneaking while holding something in their hand.
        Returns:
        if the interaction should continue when player is holding something in their hand
        Default:
        false
